body_html:
From my point of view log_sigmoid would look better, more readable.

I meant that the inputs are different for those losses, not than one abbreviates the name and other one doesn't. I think, it makes sense to rename BCEWithLogitsLoss into BCELoss and BCELoss into something like BinaryNLLLoss so that its inputs types correspond to the multiclass analogs.
body_text:
From my point of view log_sigmoid would look better, more readable.
I meant that the inputs are different for those losses, not than one abbreviates the name and other one doesn't. I think, it makes sense to rename BCEWithLogitsLoss into BCELoss and BCELoss into something like BinaryNLLLoss so that its inputs types correspond to the multiclass analogs.
body:
From my point of view `log_sigmoid` would look better, more readable.

I meant that the inputs are different for those losses, not than one abbreviates the name and other one doesn't. I think, it makes sense to rename `BCEWithLogitsLoss` into `BCELoss` and `BCELoss` into something like `BinaryNLLLoss` so that its inputs types correspond to the multiclass analogs.
